result.ga: is é a bhí i gceist agam ná
result.orig: is é a bhí i gceist agam ná
result.html: is é a bhí i gceist agam náWhat I meant was...
result.ponchtml: is é a ḃí i gceist agam náWhat I meant was...

result.eng: He meant not only health of the body but also health of the mind.
